headline: Video of Assault in Egypt Stirs Outrage
abstract: The police said they were investigating the video, which showed a group of men swarming around a woman, grabbing at her as she screamed.
lead_paragraph: The Egyptian authorities said on Thursday that they were investigating a video of a woman being attacked by a mob of men that has ignited widespread outrage over the countryâ€™s longstanding problems with sexual violence.
